name: SetServiceRuleOutcomesBatch
description:
Batch set multiple service-rule outcomes.

This tool is used to set multiple service-rule outcomes in a single batched request to Datadog, making it efficient for updating multiple outcomes simultaneously.

parameters.name: scorecard_outcomes_batch
parameters.description: JSON batch request for scorecard outcomes, including service details, rule evaluations, and remarks.

remarks.description: Any remarks regarding the scorecard rule's evaluation, and supports HTML hyperlinks.

rule_id.description: The unique ID for a scorecard rule.

service_name.description: The unique name for a service in the catalog.

state.description: The state of the rule evaluation.

results.description: Set of scorecard outcomes to update.

attributes.description: The JSON:API attributes for a batched set of scorecard outcomes.

type.description: The JSON:API type for scorecard outcomes.
